name: Charles Phan's Flavored Fish Sauce
description: Use this fish sauce in salad dressings, like Charles Phan's Green Papaya Salad from Vietnamese Home Cooking, or on top of fish or chicken.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup distilled white vinegar or freshly squeezed lemon juice
1 to 2 Thai chiles, stemmed and minced

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine the fish sauce, sugar, vinegar or lemon juice, and 1/2 cup water and stir until the sugar has dissolved. Add the garlic and chiles and stir to combine. Use immediately, or refrigerate for up to 1 week if made with vinegar or up to 2 days if made with lemon juice.
